MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK8 postcode area of Stirling. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:00pm to safely complete repairs on our underground cable network and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:29pm on Friday, 05 March 2021
